short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switches Amazon URL between amazon.co.jp and amazon.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon URL Switcherは、Amazon.co.jpとAmazon.comのURLを簡単に切り替えるための便利な拡張機能です。日本国内でのAmazon.co.jpの利用と、海外でのAmazon.comの利用をスムーズに行いたい方に最適です。

主な機能と特徴:

ワンクリックでAmazon.co.jpとAmazon.comのURLを切り替え
シンプルで使いやすいインターフェース

Amazonで輸入、輸出を行っており頻繁にURLを切り替える必要がある方
毎回URLを.co.jpから.comに手動で切り替えていて煩わしい方におすすめです。
説明note: https://note.com/roievolve/n/n3b9f1260af08 

-----------------
Amazon URL Switcher is a handy extension to easily switch between Amazon.co.jp and Amazon.com URLs. It is ideal for those who want to smoothly use Amazon.co.jp in Japan and Amazon.com overseas.

Main functions and features:

Switch between Amazon.co.jp and Amazon.com URLs with one click
Simple and easy-to-use interface

Those who import and export on Amazon and need to switch URLs frequently
Recommended for those who are annoyed by manually switching the URL from .co.jp to .com every time.
